list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Set up runtime directories and enhance service configuration
Added proper runtime directory setup for Gunicorn to avoid permission issues. Enhanced Nginx configuration with default server and improved service environment variable settings. Included final checks to verify service status and handle common issues.

task.summary:
Ensure noninteractive package installation and preconfigure iptables
Pre-configured iptables-persistent to skip interactive prompts and set the DEBIAN_FRONTEND to noninteractive to streamline package installation. This prevents installation scripts from pausing for user input, making the provisioning process fully automated.

Refactor iptables-persistent installation process
Separate iptables-persistent installation to ensure stronger prompt suppression and prevent user interaction. Added steps to generate default rules files and reinforced noninteractive settings for seamless deployment.

Replace iptables-persistent with custom persistence setup
Switched from iptables-persistent package to a custom solution for managing iptables persistence. Created a systemd service to restore rules at boot and adjusted the script to save the current rules accordingly. This change simplifies the setup and avoids dependency on iptables-persistent.

Set up runtime directories and enhance service configuration
Added proper runtime directory setup for Gunicorn to avoid permission issues. Enhanced Nginx configuration with default server and improved service environment variable settings. Included final checks to verify service status and handle common issues.
